snippet.title: The Last Friend - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Last Friend is a tower-defense beat ’em-up mash-up that will keep players immersed in a multi-tasking experience by merging strategy and action for all those dog-lover players out there!

Featuring dynamic comic style and animations, nostalgic feeling of classic arcade Beat’em-ups and fast-paced fight mechanics.

Wishlist on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/944430/The_Last_Friend/
Green Man Gaming: https://www.greenmangaming.com/games/the-last-friend-pc/

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheStonebotStudio/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theStonebot
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thestonebot/

Press Kit:
http://press.thestonebot.com/sheet.php?p=the_last_friend
